channel.title: not-python on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in not-python on A Hugo website

item.title: R can do anything
item.description: Post number two! Exciting! There has been a selection pressure to do stuff in Python. Python is the corporate language of choice; everyone else uses Python. Python even makes cups of tea. Using R is a heresy. I have started re-invigorating some of my earlier R-projects that have since been migrated into Python. During the strange COVID-esque end-of-2020 this has been a source of pleasure. I had the desire to learn some of the Tidyverse tricks and tools - it’s wonderful!
